experiences.notes: Leading frontend development for Delos, a global wellness technology leader. Built and maintained enterprise-grade React applications with TypeScript, Material-UI, and Sass. Developed cross-platform solutions with React Native. Implemented modern development practices including automated testing, CI/CD pipelines, and performance optimization achieving 90+ Lighthouse scores.

Developed mission-critical healthcare applications for Science37, a leading clinical research platform. Built scalable React applications with Redux state management, implemented design systems using Storybook, and collaborated with UX teams via Figma. Utilized Styled Components and Sass for maintainable styling architecture.

Architected and developed a fintech compliance application for Anti-Money Laundering operations. Built full-stack solution using React, Node.js with Express, and modern styling with Bootstrap/Sass. Delivered secure, performant application serving critical banking operations.

Development of applications and websites applying the latest technologies on the market. I give complete solutions, front-end, and backend. Some of the tools and languages used: HTML5, CSS, GitHub, React Js, Node Js, MongoDB, among others.

Area: Anti-Money Laundering. Impact analysis. Effort's estimation and budget developments. COBOL programming. BATCH & Online (CICS/ALTAMIRA) using VSAM / QSAM files, MQ and DB2. Unit, integral and user tests.

Area: Risk managment (systems in recovery). Review and acceptance of requirements. Preparation of technical designs for delivery to a Soft Factory. Acceptance and approval of developments made by them. Attention to productive incidents.
Area: Market and Liabilities. Analysis. Impact analysis. Development of COBOL components in TSO/HOST.
Project: IBERDROLA from Spain. Development of COBOL components Batch and Cics. Use of DB2, MQ, JCLs. Use of CMii 3.
